body:
Dear all,


I am using a Canon EOS 5D MARK III digital camera with EF 8-15mm f/4L
Fisheye USM lens to take HDR image. I need to automate HDR capture during
my experiment. I was wondering if you could advise me what is the best way
to have an automated capturing.


Any help is appreciated,
Thanks,
Raha
